subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The theme of this year’s Winter Classic, to be played at Heinz Field between the Pittsburgh Penguins and the Washington Capitals, is mainly about Sidney Crosby and Alex Ovechkin.
snippet: The theme of this year’s Winter Classic, to be played at Heinz Field between the Pittsburgh Penguins and the Washington Capitals, is mainly about Sidney Crosby and Alex Ovechkin.
